response.overview: "Gaaon Ki Maati" have a 70's -80's movie pattern .where good & Bad people's conflicts are high and it ends with victory of good.its not a big budget movie but all artist doesn't look new ,they entertain you with their skills.artist are Saawal Khan,Utkarsha Rao, Shilu Pandit, Devdutt Budholiya etc.film is produced by Suhail Ahmed & Directed by Sadaiv Ranjan.
response.title: Gaon Ki Maati
